description: Streetbrew Games brings you Brewdoku: * Features the complete Streetbrew client * Enjoy classic sudoku in a social setting! Complete puzzles of various difficulties and post your winning times to the places you visit. Send your scores to Facebook and Twitter so your friends can see where you're playing and how you're faring. Players may infuse their brewdoku with shots of frustresso to increase the level of difficulty. The difficulty ranges from 1 shot (fairly easy) to 5 shots (fairly difficult). The harder the puzzle, the more points you score when you play at a wall. Note: Swipe the pen palette to reveal the pencil palette, or use your keypad (hold uppercase for pencil marks). To learn more, visit us on the web at Streetbrew.com.
